sentences.en: Do you know if hereabout have preferable refectory for Western - style food.
sentences.cn: 你知道附近有比较好的西餐厅吗?

sentences.en: I confess I can see no curtains hereabout that answer their description.
sentences.cn: 说实话,我在这附近看不见她们说的这种窗帘.

sentences.en: Mind your bicycles so as not to be stolen by the thieves hereabout.
sentences.cn: 请你照看好你的自行车,附近小偷很多,以免被偷.

sentences.en: The moon says to him:] 'Oh, I've been scanning pond and hole And waterway hereabout For the body of one with a sunken soul Who has put his life-light out.
sentences.cn: 月亮对他说],哦，我一直在审视着池塘和地洞,还有在附近的排水沟,因为一个人的灵魂已沦陷,熄灭了他的生命之光。

sentences.en: You shall see my gardens hereabout.
sentences.cn: 你可以在附近看看我的花园.
